targets.expr:
label_replace(
    label_replace(
        label_replace(
            quantile_over_time(
                0.95,
                {service_name="nginx", filename = "/var/log/nginx/access_log"} | status >= 200 and status < 300 | json | unwrap request_time [$__auto]
            ) by (request_uri), 
            "request_uri", 
            "/api/v3/dict/words*", 
            "request_uri", 
            "/api/v3/dict/words.*"
        ),
        "request_uri", 
        "/api/cardsets/search*", 
        "request_uri", 
        "/api/cardsets/search.*"
    ),
"request_uri", 
"/api/v2/dict/words/textsearch/*", 
"request_uri", 
"/api/v2/dict/words/textsearch/.*"  
)

label_replace(
    quantile_over_time(
        0.95,
        {service_name="nginx"} | status >= 300 and status < 500 | filename = `/var/log/nginx/access_log` | json | unwrap request_time [$__interval]
    ) by (request_uri), 
    "request_uri", 
    "/api/dict/words/*", 
    "request_uri", 
    "/api/dict/words/.*"
)
quantile_over_time(0.95,{service_name="nginx"} | status >= 500 | filename = `/var/log/nginx/access_log` | json | unwrap request_time [$__interval]) by (request_uri)
